statements: SELECT * FROM Conference WHERE id = 1;
SELECT presentation, schedule FROM Conference WHERE speaker = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, speaker FROM Conference WHERE schedule > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Conference ORDER BY schedule DESC;
SELECT speaker, COUNT(*) as presentation_count FROM Conference GROUP BY speaker;
SELECT * FROM Conference WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY schedule DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT speaker, presentation FROM Conference WHERE schedule > '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Conference WHERE speaker LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT presentation FROM Conference WHERE schedule BETWEEN '2022-03-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-04-01 23:59:59';
SELECT id, speaker FROM Conference WHERE id > 3 AND schedule <= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM presentations;
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_name FROM presentations WHERE speaker_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT presentation_name, speaker_id FROM presentations ORDER BY presentation_name ASC;
SELECT presentation_name, schedule_id, s.location FROM presentations p JOIN schedules s ON p.schedule_id = s.schedule_id;
SELECT presentation_name, speaker_id FROM presentations WHERE presentation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM presentations WHERE speaker_id = 3 ORDER BY presentation_name DESC;
SELECT presentation_name, schedules.date, schedules.time, schedules.location FROM presentations JOIN schedules ON presentations.schedule_id = schedules.schedule_id;
SELECT presentation_name, speaker_id FROM presentations WHERE speaker_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND schedule_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY speaker_id ASC, presentation_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_presentations FROM presentations;
SELECT * FROM dance_conference_presentations;
SELECT presentation_name, speaker_id FROM dance_conference_presentations ORDER BY presentation_date DESC;
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_name, speaker_name FROM dance_conference_presentations JOIN speaker_details ON dance_conference_presentations.speaker_id = speaker_details.speaker_id;
SELECT * FROM conference_schedules WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT presentation_name, speaker_organization FROM dance_conference_presentations JOIN speaker_details ON dance_conference_presentations.speaker_id = speaker_details.speaker_id;
SELECT * FROM dance_conference_presentations WHERE speaker_id = 1;
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_name FROM dance_conference_presentations ORDER BY presentation_date DESC;
SELECT presentation_name, speaker_name, speaker_organization FROM dance_conference_presentations INNER JOIN speaker_details ON dance_conference_presentations.speaker_id = speaker_details.speaker_id;

SELECT presentation_name, room_number FROM dance_conference_presentations JOIN conference_schedules ON dance_conference_presentations.presentation_id = conference_schedules.presentation_id WHERE schedule_date = '2023-07-15';

SELECT speaker_name, specialization, presentation_name FROM dance_conference_presentations JOIN speaker_details ON dance_conference_presentations.speaker_id = speaker_details.speaker_id WHERE speaker_organization = 'Company X';
SELECT * FROM presentations;
SELECT presentation_title, presentation_date FROM presentations;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers;
SELECT presentation_id, room_number, presentation_time FROM schedules;
SELECT speaker_name, presentation_title FROM speakers JOIN presentations ON speakers.speaker_id = presentations.presenter_id;
SELECT * FROM presentations;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers;
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_title, presenter_id, presentation_date FROM presentations;

SELECT presentation_title, presenter_id, speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM presentations JOIN speaker_presentations ON presentations.presentation_id = speaker_presentations.presentation_id JOIN speakers ON speakers.speaker_id = speaker_presentations.speaker_id;
SELECT schedule_id, presentation_time, room_number, presentation_title FROM schedules JOIN presentations ON schedules.presentation_id = presentations.presentation_id;
SELECT * FROM conference_presentations;
SELECT presentation_name, speaker_id FROM conference_presentations WHERE presentation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM speakers ORDER BY speaker_name ASC;
SELECT presentation_name, presentation_date FROM conference_presentations WHERE speaker_id = 101;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM rooms WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM conference_presentations WHERE presentation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_name, speaker_id FROM conference_presentations WHERE speaker_id = 101 ORDER BY presentation_name DESC;

SELECT schedule_id, presentation_name, speaker_name, schedule_time FROM schedules JOIN conference_presentations ON schedules.presentation_id = conference_presentations.presentation_id JOIN speakers ON schedules.speaker_id = speakers.speaker_id ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY room_name;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
